attributes.action: introduce reforms to the environmental protection act to better punish offenders of noise nuisance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment Environmental Health officers can seize stereos and other noise making equipment and offenders can be fined. Unfortunately offenders often replace the seized equipment and are on benefits so the £1 a week taken for the fine has little impact.

We request the prime minister consider introducing additional punishments for repeat offenders particularly those playing loud music and allow environmental health officers to also seize an offenders CDs, records and tapes.

Should that fail we request the final punishment to be a seizure of all noise making equipment, CDs, records and tapes as well as an ASBO banning the perpetrator from visiting electrical stores and music stores
